channel.title: Complex Systems on Serhat Giydiren
channel.description: Recent content in Complex Systems on Serhat Giydiren

item.title: AI Safety Diary: September 29, 2025
item.description: A diary entry on the 5th chapter of the AI Safety Book, exploring the safety challenges that arise from the interaction of multiple AI agents and the emergent properties of complex AI ecosystems.

item.title: AI Safety Diary: August 9, 2025
item.description: A diary entry summarizing chapters 1-5 of the ‘Introduction to AI Safety, Ethics, and Society’ textbook, covering catastrophic AI risks, AI fundamentals, single-agent safety, safety engineering, and complex systems.
